user_query: I want to find the best gas prices for Premium Diesel B7, Gasohol E20, and Gasohol 91, and also check the Fear and Greed Index.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest gas prices for Premium Diesel B7.
Fetch the latest gas prices for Gasohol E20.
Fetch the latest gas prices for Gasohol 91.
Retrieve the current Fear and Greed Index to analyze market conditions.
